author: ariostas
body: This is a port of #49239 to master. I missed this commit while porting the developments of the NanoAODRNtupleOutputModule in #49551, which is now causing a conflict between the `master` and `RNTUPLE_X` branches.
title: Add rntupleWriteOptions param to NanoAODRNtupleOutputModule [port from RNTUPLE_X]
